desc: Clare Maria's Closet, Australian Made in Kangaroo Valley NSW. Garments made with simple, sustainable, sumptuously soft organic cotton. Organic Cotton Baby Clothing, Accessories and Relaxation Wear, for Mother and Baby. Easy Wash and Wear, Soft Breathable Long Lasting.

layout.text: Designed in Kangaroo Valley NSW. Garments made with simple, sustainable, sumptuously soft organic cotton. Made in Australia.
